meanings.definition: A protein found in muscle tissue.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the meromyosins under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: Athletes need meromyosins to build strong muscles.
meanings.sent3: The meromyosins in the gym flexed their protein muscles.
meanings.sent4: The meromyosins were the building blocks of muscle strength.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used models to explain the role of meromyosins in muscles.

meanings.sent1: The meromyosins were like puzzle pieces in the muscle structure.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the meromyosins in the sample.
meanings.sent3: The meromyosins played hide and seek in the muscle fibers.
meanings.sent4: The meromyosins were the tiny warriors fighting for muscle function.
meanings.sent5: The textbook illustrated the arrangement of meromyosins in muscle cells.
